person.persName: David P. Mears (Green County Farmer and)

body.p: Kentucky public servant and farmer. Lived in Green County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Elizabeht Mears. Father of John A. R. Mears, Mary A. Mears, Susan A. Mears, Antoinett Mears, Lucy T. Mears, and Joseph L. Mears. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860. Member of the Democratic Party. Served as clerk of the Green County Court in 1859. Served as a Green County member of Kentucky House of Representatives from 1861 to 1863.
